comments.author: CryptoHeadlineNews

Don't you know that 1xbet or 1xbit is considered as a scam casino with lots of scam accusation present on this forum? Or are you an affiliate to them, looking for who to lure, so they could confiscate fund and give you your percentage?

comments.author: klidex
comments.body: Quote from: bittraffic on January 31, 2023, 04:14:17 PMBeating them means your funds may be at risk because what scam casinos do is that they freeze the account of users that kept winning and in this case, 1xbit/1xbet will have no problem doing it after all they are already branded in this forum.That's right, the review of how to beat the 1xbet gambling platform is just a joke and will probably never be done.1xbet is a gambling platform in which there is a team to be able to manage the platform, so it's impossible for the team to easily let someone beat them and make them suffer losses.Precisely what will happen is that the account will be frozen and the stored funds can simply disappear while our efforts to defeat it will only be in vain and we ourselves will become the next victims of the scam platform.

comments.author: DarkStar_
comments.body: Quote from: Eternad on January 31, 2023, 03:51:28 PMThey why do you need to mention the name of the casino while it doesn’t necessary for your picks. You can just simply post all your tips without mentioning 1xbet if you really don’t like them. 1xbet is affiliated to 1xbit which is a serial scammer here in forum.1xbet/1xbit are pretty well known for offering really good odds on a lot random markets, and they're also not known for being very sharp. Assuming their picks are actually taken from 1xbet lines, you'd really really struggle to find comparable lines on other sportsbooks that aren't 1xbet clones.That said, I also don't see the point in this thread. Showing that they're beatable doesn't accomplish anything new.

comments.author: Hispo
comments.body: No offense OP, but I find it weird someone would even share tips for a casino they do not even recommend or like?What is the point of using a casino which has better odds if in the end such casino has a bad reputation? It would be just better to move onto a casino of good reputation and play safely.However, if you want to share tips for Stake, feel free to and move your thread onto the gambling discussion sub-section, since fits better there.

comments.author: Nrcewker
comments.body: First of all no one here plays on 1xbit or 1xbet. They have pretty impressive reputation here on the forum and that’s why no one plays there. Yes there are some newbies like you, who falls for the trap of high odds and deposits there. Then after they got their money stuck, they come here for help. And we tell them about the past incidents by the site. Moreover why would someone bet their own hard earned money on your predictions? No one asked for your unbelievable predictions. If these predictions are so much good and accurate, then bet yourself and live a life like a King.

comments.body: Quote from: Ivekzg on January 31, 2023, 01:24:37 PMhello, boys and girls in this thread I will post only tips from 1xBet and show you how easy is to beat them  Just to be clear I don t recommend this book I will just post tips.E Sports9INE — BlueJays eSports · Counter-Strike · CCT North EuropeWed · 01 Feb, 2023 · 19:00Pick : 9INE 1,66Cibona — Alkar Basketball · Croatia · Croatia A1Tuesday · 31 Jan, 2023 · 18:002 Half Total 80,5Pick : Over 80,5  2,17   Is this the 1xbet I see that can be downloaded from the play store android phone? Because of this platform, it is legitimately not good to use that casino for most communities here on this forum, to be honest.
